name: Joey Valence & Brae
description: '''Joey Valence & Brae''' are an American [[hip-hop]] duo from [[State College, Pennsylvania]], consisting of rappers '''Joseph Bertolino''' (Joey Valence) and '''Braedan Lugue''' (Brae). Their single "Punk Tactics" went viral in 2022. They have since released three studio albums, ''[[Punk Tactics]]'', ''[[No Hands (album)|No Hands]]'', and ''[[Hyperyouth]]'' in 2023, 2024, and 2025 respectively.
